text: Transport </s> Orders went out today to deploy 17,000 U.S. Army soldiers in the Persian Gulf region .
End-Position </s> We 're talking about possibilities of full scale war with former Congressman Tom Andrews , Democrat of Maine .
Attack </s> We 're talking about possibilities of full scale war with former Congressman Tom Andrews , Democrat of Maine .
End-Position </s> He 's now national director of Win Without War , and former Congressman Bob Dornan , Republican of California .

Attack </s> BEGALA Bob , one of the reasons I think so many Americans are worried about this war and so many people around the world do n't want to go is there have been a lot of problems with credibility from this administration .

End-Position </s> Our president has repeatedly , for example , relied on a man whom you 're aware , Hussein Kamel , Saddam Hussein 's son - in - law , leader of the Iraq arms program who defected for a time .
Transport </s> And gave us a whole lot of information and then went home and his father - in - law killed him .
Die </s> And gave us a whole lot of information and then went home and his father - in - law killed him .
Transport </s> The fact that this guy was such an idiot to go back and let his father - in - law kill him shows he was n't the most stable of people .
Die </s> The fact that this guy was such an idiot to go back and let his father - in - law kill him shows he was n't the most stable of people .
Attack </s> DORNAN Paul , look , the problem is I would stipulate all four of us hates war . Any rational person hates war .
Die </s> Clinton suffered greatly over the 19 Rangers that died , 18 on the 3rd of October and Matt Reersen ( ph ) three days later .
Meet </s> I visited all their families .
Transport </s> Let me tell you , what trips to Walter Reed taught me was , that whoever thought up the term , the law of unintended consequences it pertains to war .
Attack </s> Let me tell you , what trips to Walter Reed taught me was , that whoever thought up the term , the law of unintended consequences it pertains to war .
Attack </s> He will blow a city off the earth in a minute if he can get the hold of the means to do it .
Attack </s> NOVAK Tom Andrews , I think we all realize that a government does n't go to war a nation goes to war .
Transport </s> And so I would like you to take a look at the CNN/"USA TODAY" / Gallup poll , taken last week , should U.S. troops to go to Iraq to remove Saddam Hussein from power .

Transport </s> Favor 59 % , opposed 37 % , that 's a vastly larger support than President Bush Senior had in getting the U.S. troops out of Kuwait before that war started . That 's pretty good support is n't it ?

Attack </s> Favor 59 % , opposed 37 % , that 's a vastly larger support than President Bush Senior had in getting the U.S. troops out of Kuwait before that war started . That 's pretty good support is n't it ?

Attack </s> Ask them about going and not just a war , Bob , but an invasion and occupying for up to 10 years a sovereign Arab nation in the midst of one of the most distable and volatile regions in the world .

Attack </s> They 're not coming forward and telling us what the risks are , what the costs are , how many years we might be in , the possibility of us getting bogged down , because what Americans know that , they 're opposed to this war .
Attack </s> The more they learn about this invasion , the more they learn about this occupation , the less they support it .
Attack </s> BEGALA That 's going to have to be last war , unfair and unfortunate as that is , I am sorry , they 're telling us we 're out of time .
